titleStmt.title: In the time of Gods visitation by sicknesse or mortality especially may be used by governours of families.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Valentine Simmes, dwelling on Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Form of prayer, recommended for use at the time of the plague.
Date of publication supplied from STC (2nd ed.)
Initial; printed inside border of printers' ornaments.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne
